oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Book entitled "Memorial Address: Life and Character of Abraham Lincoln"
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published memorial address on the "Life and Character of Abraham Lincoln" delivered before Congress in the US House of Representatives on February 12, 1866, by historian George Bancroft.; Published by the Government Printing Office in Washington in 1866. Bancroft is referred to as the "Father of American History" largely because of his early multi-volume history of the US.
